body_html:
For what it's worth, I also had this problem today while trying to build Tensorflow on Windows using Bazel. I think the problem was that I had the msys2 shell installed alongside Git for Windows (which also installs a version -- possibly a newer version -- of the msys2 shell in the form of Git Bash). After I uninstalled Git for Windows, this error went away.

(That's not to say that my Bazel build started working... I've spent three days trying to get it to work and it still fails. I'm basically to the point of giving up and going back to Ubuntu.)

body:
For what it's worth, I also had this problem today while trying to build Tensorflow on Windows using Bazel.  I think the problem was that I had the msys2 shell installed alongside Git for Windows (which also installs a version -- possibly a newer version -- of the msys2 shell in the form of Git Bash).  After I uninstalled Git for Windows, this error went away.  

(That's not to say that my Bazel build started working... I've spent three days trying to get it to work and it still fails.  I'm basically to the point of giving up and going back to Ubuntu.)
